mapper.select: select ss.stu_name as stuName,st.teacher_id as teacherId,ifnull(ssh.continue_sign_month,0)+1 as continueSignMonth from school_student as ss left join school_teacher as st on ss.pk_teacher_id=st.teacher_id left join school_sign_history as ssh on ssh.pk_stu_id=ss.stu_id and date(ssh.sign_history_create)=curdate()-1 where ss.stu_id=#{stuId} and ss.is_deleted=0
